name: HueBots
description: HueBots is a deceptively challenging top-down puzzle game. You control a team of colorful robots that will only interact with objects that match their color; they will also keep moving in one direction until they collide with something that matches their color.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core Processor or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
